analysis:
Entries in Art and design subjects have decreased sharply across the UK over the last four years. The -66.2% change is smaller than the overall change, of -48.5%, in all AS-Level entries over the last four years.

Across the UK, a greater proportion of students achieved the top grades in Art and design subjects in 2017 compared to all AS-Level subjects. A total of 71.4% of pupils achieved A-C grades in Art and design subjects compared to 63.6% for all subjects.

Entries in Biology have decreased sharply across the UK over the last four years. The -63.2% change is smaller than the overall change, of -48.5%, in all AS-Level entries over the last four years.

Across the UK, a smaller proportion of students achieved the top grades in Biology in 2017 compared to all AS-Level subjects. A total of 52.1% of pupils achieved A-C grades in Biology compared to 63.6% for all subjects.
